2023.title: Android Studio Giraffe (2022.3.1) & Hedgehog (2023.1.1)
2023.description: Giraffe (2022.3.1 Patch 4 in Nov 2023) delivered bug fixes and stability enhancements; Hedgehog (2023.1.1 in Nov 2023) introduced Compact Mode, distraction‑free improvements, vertical/horizontal splits, macOS project tabs, and advanced tool‑window actions.

2023.title: Android Studio Iguana (2023.2.1 Beta/Canary)
2023.description: Iguana preview builds throughout late‑2023 added IntelliJ 2023.2 platform improvements, gRPC support in Network Inspector, enhanced Espresso Recorder, updates to Layout/Navigation Inspectors, and introduced App development with Gemini Pro via Google AI SDK.

2023.title: Jetpack Compose enhancements
2023.description: Compose Animation Preview was updated in Giraffe to support animate\*AsState, CrossFade, rememberInfiniteTransition and AnimatedContent (with Compose 1.4.0‑alpha04+). Compose continues to be the recommended UI toolkit.

2023.title: SDK & Build Tools updates for Android 14
2023.description: Build‑Tools 34.0.0 (Feb 2023) added support for Android 14 preview APIs. SDK Platform‑Tools and Platform updates throughout 2023 ensured full compatibility with Android 14.

2023.title: Android Studio Studio Bot & SDK Upgrade Assistant
2023.description: Giraffe introduced an Android SDK Upgrade Assistant to guide targetSdkVersion upgrades. Studio Bot (I/O ’23) offered AI‑powered in‑IDE suggestions and guided migrations.

2023.title: AI & Gemini integration
2023.description: By late 2023, Canary builds of Iguana previewed integrating Gemini Pro (Google AI) into Android Studio, enabling AI‑driven coding assistance, code completion, and productivity tools.

2023.title: Key productivity tools: ADB over Wi‑Fi, Firebase Device Streaming
2023.description: Community reports (Reddit/r/androiddev) highlighted reworked persistent ADB over Wi‑Fi (auto‑reconnect), and Firebase Device Streaming from real devices in OEM labs.
